writer.name: 菲利普·阿拉丁吉 Philippe Aractingi

this_title: Liban, les secrets du royaume de Byblos
trans_title: Geheimnisvolles Byblos – Antike Weltstadt im Libanon
Secret Lebanon: The Treasures of Byblos
introduction: On the coast of Lebanon lies one of the oldest cities in the world: Byblos. During antiquity, this powerful and prosperous city was an important center of trade and cultural exchange with Egypt and Mesopotamia. Its excavation taking place for over a century, it was believed that Byblos had revealed all its secrets… But now, new discoveries and texts unveil a surprising and spectacular side of Byblos.COPRODUCTION :GEDEON Programmes, ARTE FranceIN PARTNERSHIP WITH :Ministère de la Culture / Direction Générale des Antiquités du Liban & Musée du Louvre, with the participation de Histoire TV, in association with Special Broadcasting Service (SBS) Australia, AMC Network Spain, Centre national du cinéma et de l'image animée (CNC) , Procirep - Société des Producteurs - Angoa
chinese_title: Liban, les secrets du royaume de Byblos
